categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Baggro was a senior male Mon Calamari Jedi Padawan who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a Commander in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

A Force-sensitive Mon Calamari, Baggro received training in the ways of the Force at the Coruscant Jedi Temple's academy. Selected as a Padawan before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, Baggro became a Commander in the Grand Army of the Republic.

Soon after the battle at Kothlis, Padawan Baggro joined fellow apprentice Ahsoka Tano as part of Green team in a competition arranged by Jedi Master Taria Damsin. The competition, taking place in the new Sublevel Nineteen Training Dojo, ended in a tie. Baggro made it through several stages of the dojo before being defeated in the zero-gravity area. Baggro quickly exited the dojo to wait for the competition to end.
